alert.note: Alert for Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 8:21PM CDT until May 14 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Washington County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 821 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles east of Tibbie, or 8 miles southeast of Chatom, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wagarville, Deer Park, Tibbie and McIntosh. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
